name: guardian
story:
Three gangs have taken over your once peaceful neighborhood. Your job: break them up and convert their evil bosses to your side. Only then can you to regain your city and unmask the shocking identity of Mr. Big.

The names of the player characters in this game are Conner, Chief, Tanya and Javier. The names of the gangs are The Dreads, The Shavers, and The Dragons. You can play up to seven different characters: The four heroes plus the three gang bosses, but only after you have defeated them and converted them to your side.
